Gadget.title: Gadget
descriptionStrings: Delivered major features for a full-stack application development platform in a high-speed startup environment, supporting a customer base that grew by 8x
Developed and maintained billing and account-control systems using Stripe and Orb to handle usage tracking, invoicing, and automatic account freezing

Enhanced the platform's AI Assistant by implementing tool calls & contextual app-state based LLM prompting, enabling automated code generation, schema updates, data creation, and error resolution â€” increasing the potential user base by minimizing the technical expertise required to build an app

Improved Shopify integration onboarding and app-creation pipelines, reducing time-to-value, increasing activation rates from 32% to 70%, and enabling ecommerce agency users to onboard clients faster and scale growth
Implemented ChatGPT integration enabling users to build custom MCP servers with authenticated, user-defined React frontends that render within ChatGPT
Developed an operations dashboard to present detailed app metrics, error analysis, and cost visibility to help users optimize performance & usage

Authored Autocomponents, a backend schema-driven React component library that automatically generates UI elements synced with backend models to accelerate development by avoiding boilerplate & manual UI redefinitions

Enhanced the in-browser code editor experience with full-text search, and a TypeScript language server, providing IDE-grade autocomplete, syntax highlighting, reference navigation, and error detection for prompting AI fixes

Developed a source-controlled, multi-environment application state system and platform-level backup and migration tooling, allowing the platform to seamlessly migrate existing customer apps to the new system and eliminating the biggest technical platform barrier for converting new agency customers
Providing mentorship and in-depth code review for interns and new hires

Spiria.title: Spiria
descriptionStrings: Developed a new feature for a timesheeting application that allows system administrators & users to setup & use conditionally automated time entries resulting in daily time saves for all users using JavaScript, PHP+Laravel, and SQL
Developed a new feature for system administrators of a timesheeting application that better organizes time tracking to gain better project management insights using JavaScript, PHP+Laravel, and SQL
Developed frontend React components for the company library using Material UI with thorough test coverage
Resolved backend API authentication bugs with PHP & asserted expected behavior through integration testing
Developed MariaDB SQL procedures and migration scripts
Developed Confluence macro plugins using Java to accelerate the process of writing documentation pages
Technologies: PHP, React, TypeScript, jQuery, MariaDB, SQL

Kinaxis.title: Kinaxis
descriptionStrings: Conducted migrations and refactored the server & test environments to assist in removing subscription based dependencies, saving up to $250/developer/month

Designed thorough integration & unit tests to validate functionality and increase code coverage during CI/CD
Technologies: Java GUIs, C#/.NET APIs, Visual Studio, Eclipse, Postman, Git, Jenkins

Developed database procedures using MS SQL Server
Wrote in-depth wiki guides detailing internal application design techniques, and working with Agile methodology
Received highest performing co-op award and $300 bonus

JSI_Frontend.title: JSI
descriptionStrings: Developed & delivered a feature to import custom user templates to a DB to generate reports using an Angular frontend, a C#/.NET API backend, and a MySQL database

Received highest performing co-op award and $300 bonus
Technologies: Angular, C#/.NET, Visual Studio, VSCode, MS SQL Server, Postman, Git, Jenkins
